name: To Go Alone
description:
This was made for UF DevLUp gamejam under the theme "Just Pick One". There's not really any gameplay, more of an interactive scene. It was meant to me a "legend of zelda 1986 meets doom" but time management, blender to unity issues, and a lot of time spent learning new things led it to be what it was. At least it looks cool :)

Keys:

F - Grab

Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump


Assets Used:

  1. https://www.cgtrader.com/items/696175/download-page
  2. https://freepbr.com/materials/stone-block-wall/
  3. https://freepbr.com/materials/limestone-6-rock/
  4. https://freepbr.com/materials/lava-and-rock-pbr/
  5. https://freepbr.com/materials/rocky-dirt/
  6. https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/ancient-torch-dbfb8b1b8f0a407a8f65beaaa540ad71#download
  7. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G0R7MIbX3MU
  8. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/10-skyboxes-pack-day-night-32236

  9. https://www.dafont.com/sherwood.font
